Mailing Address: c/o Sandy Neddow3415 Moberly Rd SWKelowna, BC     V1W 3H9
Service Details: - Provides an environment of unity within the local blind and visually impaired community, where members can enhance their creative abilities, energies and talents- Works to promote self-esteem and confidence by offering varied recreational and social activities, encouraging personal bonds and a strong spirit of community within its membership- Sport and social activities are adapted to accommodate our members that allows any member, regardless of their disability, to participate
Meetings: 1st Mon of each month * DeDutch Restaurant, 1749 Gordon Dr, Kelowna (corner of Gordon Dr and Harvey Ave * no meetings during Jul and Aug
Elections: Every year, with two positions being alternated each year.
Print Material: Printed materials are also available in Braille
